law.catch_line: Parking time limited on certain streets within municipalities.

text.section:
Sec. 30-388.6. Parking time limited on certain streets within municipalities.
With the written approval of the Traffic Engineering Branch of the Public Works Department of Miami-Dade County, municipalities may erect traffic signs limiting the time for parking vehicles on certain streets or locations within such municipality. When such signs are erected giving notice of the limitation of time for parking, no person shall stop, stand or park a vehicle for longer than the time specified by such municipal traffic signs.
